title: Good Serif to go with DIN or Gotham?
content: I am doing a project about environmental hazards and I am using [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20150217234018/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gotham) or possibly [DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20150217234018/http:/typophile.com/wiki/DIN) as means of communicating bold messages. I may use a serif typeface to go with it, and was wondering if anyone has a suggestion. Thanks!
author: becker513
